mapper.select: select shop_item_addr1 as shopItemAddr1 from shop_item_tbl where shop_item_addr1 like '%'||#{shopItemAddr1}||'%'
select shop_item_addr1 as shopItemAddr1 from shop_item_tbl where shop_item_idx= #{shopItemIdx}

select shop_item_idx as shopItemIdx, shop_item_addr1 as shopItemAddr1, shop_item_manager as shopItemManager, shop_item_type1 as shopItemType1, shop_item_deal_type as shopItemDealType, shop_item_title as shopItemTitle, shop_item_sale_state as shopItemSaleState, shop_item_premium_state as shopItemPremiumState, shop_item_reg_date as shopItemRegDate from shop_item_tbl
